Question: This person and Aero debuted as DJs on the mainstage at Ultra Music Festival during Winter Music Conference (WMC) in 2004.
Hints: Although **** distanced himself from Mötley Crüe after splitting, he agreed to take part in their 2001 autobiography, The Dirt.
This person was also one of the producers of the show.
This person and DJ Aero also accompanied deadmau5 in his 2011 Meowington Hax tour.
